bibl.title: Πατέρες τοῦ ἁγίου Νεκλονίου. Functionaries of the Naqlun Monastery in the First Two Centuries of its Existence.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: Explore the organisation of the monastic community at Naqlun in the 6th and 7th centuries. - Sources. - Prosopography. - Preliminary conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Tomasz Derda & Joanna Wegner, Πατέρες τοῦ ἁγίου Νεκλονίου. Functionaries of the Naqlun Monastery in the First Two Centuries of its Existence.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 73-97.
Explore the organisation of the monastic community at Naqlun in the 6th and 7th centuries. - Sources. - Prosopography. - Preliminary conclusions. - Avec résumé en anglais.
